lesson_name: While Loops, For Loops, and Iteration
description: 20 prompts covering WhileLoop, ForLoop, nested iteration, loop+branch, loop+variable patterns. Zero coverage in previous lessons.

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay runs a ForLoop from 0 to 9 and prints the index each iteration.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_ForLoopPrint
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: ForLoop [FirstIndex=0, LastIndex=9]
NODE n3: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.LoopBody -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Index -> n3.InString [String]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay uses a ForLoop 0 to 4 to spawn 5 actors in a row, each 200 units apart on the X axis.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_RowSpawner
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: ForLoop [FirstIndex=0, LastIndex=4]
NODE n3: MultiplyFloat [B=200.0]
NODE n4: MakeVector [Y=0, Z=0]
NODE n5: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_Item]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.LoopBody -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.Index -> n3.A [Float]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.X [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.SpawnTransform [Transform]
